debates.showAs: Sale of Nitrous Oxide and Related Products Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate and licence the sale of nitrous oxide to exempted purchasers, to prohibit the sale of nitrous oxide and nitrous oxide products to a person who has not attained the age of 18 years, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do rialáil agus do cheadúnú díol ocsaíde nítriúla le ceannaitheoirí díolmhaithe, do thoirmeasc ocsaíd nítriúil agus táirgí ocsaíde nítriúla a dhíol le duine nach bhfuil 18 mbliana d’aois slánaithe aige nó aici, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Sale of Nitrous Oxide and Related Products Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhíol Ocsaíde Nítriúla agus Táirgí Gaolmhara, 2025

debates.showAs: Sale of Nitrous Oxide and Related Products Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate and licence the sale of nitrous oxide to exempted purchasers, to prohibit the sale of nitrous oxide and nitrous oxide products to a person who has not attained the age of 18 years, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do rialáil agus do cheadúnú díol ocsaíde nítriúla le ceannaitheoirí díolmhaithe, do thoirmeasc ocsaíd nítriúil agus táirgí ocsaíde nítriúla a dhíol le duine nach bhfuil 18 mbliana d’aois slánaithe aige nó aici, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Sale of Nitrous Oxide and Related Products Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhíol Ocsaíde Nítriúla agus Táirgí Gaolmhara, 2024

debates.showAs: Child Care (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate the sale of nitrous oxide gas by prohibiting its sale in a reusable cylinder or disposable cartridge to a person who has not attained the age of 18 years and for that purpose to amend the Child Care Act 1991 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun díol gáis ocsaíde nítriúla a rialáil trí thoirmeasc a chur lena dhíol i sorcóir in-athúsáidte nó i gcartús indiúscartha le duine nach bhfuil 18 mbliana d’aois slánaithe aige nó aici agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Chúram Leanaí, 1991 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Healthcare (Transparent Payments) Bill 2022: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Healthcare (Transparent Payments) Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Healthcare (Transparent Payments) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require pharmaceutical companies, medical equipment suppliers and their servants or agents, to declare payments, gifts, donations or other transfers of values provided to healthcare professionals or health care organisations on an annual basis.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar chuideachtaí cógaisíochta, ar sholáthraithe trealaimh liachta agus ar sheirbhísigh nó gníomhairí dá gcuid dearbhú a dhéanamh i leith íocaíochtaí, bronntanas, síntiús nó aistrithe eile ar luach a sholáthraítear do ghairmithe cúraim sláinte nó d’eagraíochtaí cúraim sláinte ar bhonn bliantúil.

debates.showAs: Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of a body to be known as Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Teoranta, to define its functions in relation to the preservation, restoration and management of the cultural historical quarter within the Moore Street Battlefield Area in line with the functions, aims and objectives set for it in this Act and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le comhlacht a bhunú ar a dtabharfar Ceathrú Chultúir 1916 Teoranta, do mhíniú a fheidhmeanna i ndáil leis an gceathrú chultúir stairiúil laistigh de Limistéar Mhachaire Catha Shráid an Mhúraigh a chaomhnú, a aisiriú agus a bhainistiú de réir na bhfeidhmeanna, na n-aidhmeanna agus na gcuspóirí atá leagtha amach dó san Acht seo agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Road Traffic Acts 1961 to 2020 to give Gardaí the power to seize and detain quad bikes and scrambler motorcycles when being used unlawfully including in public parks and green spaces and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na nAchtanna um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 go 2020 chun an chumhacht a thabhairt do Ghardaí cuadrothair agus gluaisrothair streachailte a urghabháil agus a choinneáil nuair a úsáidtear go neamhdhleathach iad, lena n-áirítear i bpáirceanna poiblí agus i spásanna glasa, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Justice (Public Order) (Quadbikes and Scramblers) (Amendment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Cheartas Coiriúil (Ord Poiblí) (Cuadrothair agus Gluaisrothair Streachailte) (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Broadcasting (Amendment) (Protection of Journalism) Bill 2019: Second Stage (Resumed)
Broadcasting (Amendment) (Protection of Journalism) Bill 2019: Second Stage [Private Members]
Broadcasting (Amendment) (Protection of Journalism) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Broadcasting Act 2009 to make it a breach of contract or licence under the Act to prohibit a member of the National Union of Journalists from communications media for reason or reasons of occupation, employer, or employment status.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Craolacháin, 2009 chun sárú ar chonradh nó ceadúnas faoin Acht a dhéanamh de chomhalta de Cheardchumann Náisiúnta na nIriseoirí a thoirmeasc ó mheáin cumarsáide ar chúis nó cúiseanna slí beatha, fostóra nó stádais fostaíochta.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled An Act to amend the Litter Pollution Act 1997 to make it an offence for a person in charge of a dog in a public area to fail to produce a suitable bag or instrument to properly dispose of dog faeces when requested to do so by a dog warden, litter warden, or member of An Garda Síochána.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Thruailliú ó Bhruscar, 1997 agus do dhéanamh cion de dhuine a bheidh i bhfeighil madra i limistéar poiblí do mhainneachtain mála nó gléas oiriúnach a thabhairt ar aird chun faecas madra a dhiúscairt i gceart nuair a iarrfaidh maor madraí, maor bruscair nó comhalta den Gharda Síochána air nó uirthi déanamh amhlaidh.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thruailliú ó Bhruscar (Leasú) (Salachar Madraí a Rialú), 2019

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Amendment) Bill 2006: Second Stage (Resumed).
Planning and Development (Amendment) Bill 2006: Second Stage.
Planning and Development (Amendment) Bill 2006: First Stage.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2002 to restore the oblications in relation to the provision of social and affordable housing which existed under Part V of the Planning and Development Act 2000 prior to the amendment of that act in 2002
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt 2000 go 2002 chun na hoibleagáidí i ndáil le soláthar tithíochta sóisialta agus tithíochta incheannaithe a aiseag ar oibleagáidí iad a bhí ann faoi Chuid V den Acht um Pleanáil agus Forbairt 2000 roimh an Acht sin a leasú sa bhliain 2002
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú) 2006
